title: installation of dealii with specified trilinos version fails
body:
I would like to install the dealii package version 8.3.0 linked with the trilinos package version 12.4.2. I'm on a virtual machine (VirtualBox) running LinuxMint 18. Spack version is 0.10.0. Standard compiler is GCC 5.4.0.

When I type `spack spec dealii@8.3.0^trilinos@12.4.2` then spack complains that "Error: dealii does not depend on trilinos". I then compile Trilinos first running `spack install trilinos@12.4.2` which fails as well. In the compiler log I find 
"[...] Trilinos-trilinos-release-12-4-2/packages/amesos2/src/Amesos2_Superludist.cpp:92:27: error: duplicate explicit instantiation of ‘class Amesos2::Superludist<Tpetra::CrsMatrix<double, int, int>, Tpetra::MultiVector<double, int, int> >’ [-fpermissive] [...]". But I guess that is a Trilinos problem, not a Spack one.

I manage to compile Trilinos with the command `spack install trilinos@12.4.2~superlu-dist`. I then find the associated hash key with `spack find --long trilinos@12.4.2`, in my case it is "sttp4e7". If I then try to execute `spack spec dealii@8.3.0^/sttp4e7`, then Spack sais "Error: dealii does not depend on hypre, hwloc, glm, hdf5, trilinos, netlib-scalapack, libpciaccess, openmpi, netcdf, mumps, matio, boost, or parmetis".
